title: BioXcel will use $260M finance deal to expand indications for schizophrenia drug - FierceBiotech
content: BioXcel will use $260M finance deal to expand indications for schizophrenia drug  FierceBiotech
description: BioXcel Therapeutics aims to become the leading artificial-intelligence-enabled neuroscience company, and it may have just received the financing to get thereâ€“but terms apply. | The commercial-stage biopharmaceutical entered a $260 million long-term financing agreement with Oaktree Capital Management and Qatar Investment Authority to accelerate growth and commercially launch a new drug, in return for a share of the profits of any approved therapies.
